DOC.brief_summary: KNOW-KT ( KoreaN cohort study Outcome patient With KT : A 9-year Longitudinal cohort study Korean adult KT patient ) , fund Korea Center Disease Control Prevention ( KCDC ) establish 2012 group transplant physician , transplant surgeon , nephrologists , epidemiologist , biostatisticians Korea . We aim establish adult KT cohort , investigate renal allograft outcome , mortality , complication , explore traditional nontraditional risk factor morbidity mortality . We establish bio-bank integrate clinical biological information . Here , report design method KNOW-KT .
DOC.brief_title: KoreaN Cohort Study Outcome Patients With Kidney Transplantation ( KNOW-KT )
